entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as humming quietly and speaking to the Dursleys. He is also referred to as 'Professor' by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying 'I'm ready now' and being addressed by Dumbledore. His age is also discussed in the conversation.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are referred to as a family unit, with Aunt Petunia speaking on their behalf.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as speaking for the first time since Dumbledore's arrival and correcting Dumbledore about Harry's age.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being a month older than Harry and not turning 18 until the year after next.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia corrects Dumbledore about Harry's age.
Harry is part of the wizarding world, which comes of age at 17.
Dumbledore speaks to Aunt Petunia about Harry's age.
In the wizarding world, Harry comes of age at 17.
